Ingredients: Minced beef, Garlic, Ginger, Soy Sauce, Brown Sugar, Sesame Oil, Gochujang, Rice Vinegar, White Rice
Instructions: Cook beef with garlic and ginger until browned. Add sauce, simmer briefly, and serve over rice.

Ingredients: Chicken, Garlic, Ginger, Turmeric, Coreander, Cumin, Brown sugar, Fish sauce
Instructions: Marinate chicken, skewer, then grill or pan-fry until cooked. Serve with satay sauce.

Ingredients: Brown Sugar, Fish Sauce, Tamarind puree, Oyster Sauce, Canola oil, Onion, Garlic, Chicken Breast, Eggs, Beansprouts, Garlic Chives, Peanuts, Rice noodles
Instructions: Soften noodles. Stir-fry protein, egg, noodles, and sauce until well mixed and heated through.

Ingredients: Elbow Pasta, Garlic, Parmesan, Lemon Juice, Chicken Bouillon Cube, Half and half, Chicken Broth
Instructions: Cook pasta. Toss with melted butter, garlic, seasoning, and parmesan.
